userId.description: UUID of user associated with this request preference

holdShelf.description: Whether 'Hold shelf' option is available to the user. Always set to true

delivery.description: Whether 'Delivery' option is available to the user.

defaultServicePointId.description: UUID of default service point for 'Hold shelf' option

fulfillment.description: Preferred fulfillment type. Possible values are 'Delivery', 'Hold shelf'

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to request preference
